name: It started with a bang
description:
This game was made during a Game Jam but we didn't totally finished the game during the time. That's why there are two versions, one for the  game jam's vote and the other which is the full version.

FR :
Le but du jeu est d’amener (et de maintenir) la vie sur une planète où ... au début, il n'y avait rien.
----------------------------------------------------------------------
EN :
The aim of the game is to bring (and develop) life on new planet where ... at first, there was nothing.

Music from https://www.bensound.com/royalty-free-music/track/slow-motion

Gameplay

The first part of the game is to choose your planet. You have to modify settings to form your planet.

In the second part, you have to implant life and manage the species. It's like a game of life.
